name: CMT-Loader
description: A Universal Plugin to Deploy a Non-Supported Heroku Repo without any hassle.

REPO_URL.description: Deploy Repository URL, add Private Token if Repo is Private

REPO_BRANCH.description: Repo Branch, you want to deploy with your REPO_URL.

START_CMD.description: Trigger Command for your Bot to Run.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot Token, elegram Bot Token that you got from BotFather.

API_HASH.description: Api Has, You can get this from https://my.telegram.org.

API_ID.description: Api ID, Telegram Bot Token that you got from BotFather.

AUTH_CHATS.description: Chat ID Channel, Group ID (with Topic ID), Separated by space

AUTO_BYPASS.description: Command bypass, Change between Command Mode or Auto Bypass Mode. Default is False.

OWNER_ID.description: Owner ID, Telegram User ID (not username) of the Owner of the bot.

HUBDRIVE_CRYPT.description: Hubdrive Google Drive, HubDrive Crypt (Optional), It works with or without Cookie, Get from Cookie Editor Extension.

DRIVEFIRE_CRYPT.description: Drivefire Google Drive, DriveFire Crypt, Get from Cookie Editor Extension.

KATDRIVE_CRYPT.description: Katdrive Google Drive, KatDrive Crypt (Optional), It works with or without Cookie, Get from Cookie Editor Extension.

DIRECT_INDEX.description: Direct Index Link, Direct Fast Download GDrive Links.

TERA_COOKIE.description: Terabox Get the Terabox ndus Cookie from Cookie Editor Extension.
